plot: The German school system is changing. "Ganztagsschulen" provide time for a better relationship between pupils and teachers. There's more time for learning and more time for activities in school. How live of pupils, teachers, headmasters and parents changes in the "Ganztagschule" will be shown in this movie.
title: Zeit für mehr
